frog.line1: Welcome to PAUL's WORLD! I'm Froggy, your guide.
frog.line2: Paul is a Full-stack Developer with 4+ years of experience. He loves building awesome web apps!
frog.line3: Climb to the top and explore each world! The sign up there leads to the next area.

ladybug.line1: Hi! I'm Bugsy! Paul has been coding for over 4 years now.
ladybug.line2: He's worked with startups and big companies, building IoT dashboards and fintech platforms.
ladybug.line3: What drives him? Clean code, pixel-perfect UIs, and having fun while building software!

snail.line1: Hey there, I'm Shelly! Let me tell you about Paul's tech stack...
snail.line2: Angular is his specialty! Expert in v17+ with signals and standalone components.
snail.line3: Backend too: Java with Spring Boot, Python for AI/ML, and Docker for deployment!

mouse.line1: Squeaky here! Paul has built some cool projects...
mouse.line2: IoT dashboards, fintech platforms, OCR pipelines with 98% accuracy!
mouse.line3: Click on me to check out his GitHub and see the code!

frog.line1: You made it to the top! Great climbing, adventurer!
frog.line2: Want to work with Paul? He's always open to new opportunities!
frog.line3: Click on me for his GitHub, or find him on LinkedIn. Thanks for visiting!
